extension.name: Membership Pro Reminder
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 3, or later
extension.description: This plugin check and send reminder emails to subscribers to inform them about membership expire so that they can login to renew their membership

field.name: last_run
field.label: Last Run Time
field.description: Store Last Run Time of the plugin

field.name: number_subscribers
field.label: Number Subscribers
field.description: Number of subscribers which we will send reminder each time the plugin run

field.name: bcc_email
field.label: BCC Email
field.description: If you want to receive a copy of reminder email so that you can keep track of reminder, enter the email you want here

field.name: trigger_reminder_code
field.label: Trigger Reminder Code (Leave empty unless you are using cron job to send reminder)
field.description: Enter a secret string here if you want to use cron job to trigger sending reminder. Refer to our documentation for more details

field.name: time_ranges
field.label: Time Ranges
field.description: If you want to send reminder emails to registrants within certain time ranges, use this parameter. For example, set it to 5,14 will make the system only send email reminder from 5am to 2pm. Set it to 8,10;14:18 will allow sending reminders between 8 to 10 am and 2pm to 6pm.
